message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $110. I believe it offers excellent value at this price, especially considering its worth to you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer but $110 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. Let me know what you think.
I understand your perspective, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $105? This price reflects the true value of the item.
